text: 23.16-17: Mt 27.15; Zo 18.39Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu fhura phivɨgan ana khargip, ana sararim, ana ŋgɨrga.” 23.16-17 Bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, harigi kama mueŋ phorga kha vezar ki. Mba kameŋ kha muuŋgi. “Mbe kha tɨv ki. Mbe mpari tugɨra tɨgap, rotu mbui tugi bakɨvir, Pairat bɨnan ki guma the fhɨrgirim, ana kɨrar hɨrga. Ana kɨrar hɨgɨp mben han ŋgɨrga.” Ndu Mak 15.6 ganɨri.
